pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ã— Kamen Rider W & Decade: Movie War 2010 (2009, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Diend's $(l:decade/items/k_touch_diend)Final Kamen Terminal K-Touch (Diend)$(/l)$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:w/riders/skull)Kamen Rider Skull$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l) while having the $(l:decade/arsenal/neo_diendriver)Neo Diendriver$(/l) in your inventory
